name: Animatronics
startIntroPart2: Uh, I wanted to record a message for you to help you get settled in on your first night.
declaringWar: Break off limbs and heads. Pile them up. Easy peasy. Got it.
attacked: Now would be a good time to hold your breath.
introduction: It looks like someone wasn't ready for Freddy to come to the party!
neutralLetsHearIt: You sure collected a lot of toys!
hateHello: It appears you are not tall enough to ride the karts alone.
hateLetsHearIt: This is your ten minute warning; the next party needs to set up.
tradeRequest: I've prepared a special happy fun time just for you.
